title: Foreign Language Speaking Proficiency Enhancement Program Utilizing Visual Aids

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary foreign language proficiency and understanding of job-related vocabulary
context.additional_context: Mobile learning course focused on practical foreign language expressions usable in daily work contexts

learning_goals: Learners can generate continuous foreign language speech of at least three minutes based on provided visual materials.
Learners can accurately link and explain visual cues with linguistic expressions at over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present at least three diverse interpretations of visual materials through communication with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
